channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Overhanging vegetation on route to school is affecting kids from Clare House school as they make their way along the footpath., 23rd September
item.description:
I walk this way with my kids twice a day and often have to step into the footpath to avoid others as we make our way past the over hanging trees and vegetation.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oakwood Avenue, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lots broken glass and bags of rubbish thrown outside the front door, 23rd September
item.description:
Just lots of rubbish causing trip hazard or injury from broken glass
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Upper Clapton Road, London

item.title: There is a large pothole which is an health & safety issue for members of the public walking on Piermont green go to Piermont Road especially for the elderly who use this daily from the bus stop, 23rd September
item.description:
See above

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, Forest Hill Road, Nunhead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The pavement is crooked and uneven, 23rd September
item.description:
I tripped on the crooked pavement and went face down on the concrete and smashed up my face and banged my teeth. I still have sore teeth and headaches. It happened at about 8pm on 10 September. I had to go to A&E and it was bleeding for two hours. I missed a day off work because I'd such a bad bang to my head.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): St. Blaise Avenue, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Consistently over full communal bins on pavement, 23rd September
item.description:
